name: bitbucket-slack-pr-hook
description: Receive Pull Requests notifications from Bitbucket and send them to Slack.

SLACK_USERNAME.description: The slack bot's username. NOTE: Setting this will override integration settings.

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The slack channel to send notifications to. NOTE: Setting this will override integration settings.

MENTION_REVIEWERS.description: Set to true if you want to mention reviewers in slack channel.

HEX_WARNING.description: Hex Color for Unapprove, Comment: Created, Comment: Deleted, Comment: Updated
